system.requirements: Tier 3: Untouchable E.Adv, Warp Anathema, Willpower 55. Aptitudes: Willpower
system.effect: All creatures with the Daemonic Trait within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable do not gain any of the benefits of that trait.

description.value: All creatures with the Daemonic Trait within Willpower Bonus metres of the Untouchable do not gain any of the benefits of that trait.
